nodes.text: The Sands of Elath was a book kept in the Jedi Archives of the Jedi Temple on the planet Coruscant. In 87 BBY, Jedi Master Lene Kostana asked Restelly Quist, Chief Librarian of the Archives, for assistance in finding the title. Quist was surprised, as no one had requested the title in decades. While Quist was away finding the title, Kostana departed the Archives, asking Jedi Initiates Sifo-Dyas and Dooku to tell the Chief Librarian that she would return later to pick up the book.
The Sands of Elath was mentioned in a flashback in Dooku: Jedi Lost, a 2019 audiobook written by Cavan Scott.
